alert.note: Alert for Gloucester; Salem (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 1:10PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern New Castle, northwestern Salem, northwestern Gloucester and southeastern Delaware Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 110 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Arden, or near Wilmington, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chester, Carneys Point, Swarthmore, Paulsboro, Arden, Lima, Chelsea, Nether Providence Township, Chester Township, Philadelphia International Arpt, Gibbstown, Tinicum Township, Brookhaven, Ridley Park, Prospect Park, Media, Upland, Chester Heights, Eddystone and Marcus Hook. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 9. Interstate 95 in Delaware between mile markers 19 and 23. Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 12 and 18. Interstate 476 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northern Delaware...southern New Jersey...and southeastern Pennsylvania.
